page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES MOELFRE
page.content: There are lots of things for people to do in their spare time. In summer many men and boys go fishing, very few girls or women do this. Boys also play football . Women attend activities i.e Merched y Wawr, W.I. We must go outside Moelfre for some activities. There are sports centres in Llangefni and Amlwch. Girls can join the Brownies,children aged 10-14 can join Pathfinders.School has an Urdd branch. We have football teams for under 12's, 14's, & 16's. In the Community Centre we have Keep Fit for ladies, Art Class, Welsh for adults, W.E.A, Merched y Wawr, Flower Club, Weight Training, Boxing, and Youth Club, also a public library. In{ {Marianglas }there is a Y.F.C, & O.A.P club. In {Penrhoslligwy}there is a social club. Sion Richards..
